pages.text: addehattin addehattinre svantakkareyum avareateappam avarute atra alukaleyum nam pradanam ceyyukayum ceytu. nam'mute pakkal ninnulla karunyavum bud'dhimanmarkk oru ulbeadhanavumenna nilayil

ni oru piti pull ninre kaiyil etukkuka. ennitt atu keant ni atikkukayum sapatham langhikkatirikkukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum addehatte nam ksamasilanayi kantu. valare nalla dasan! tirccayayum addeham ere khediccumatannunnavanakunnu
kaikkaruttum kalcappatukalum ullavarayirunna nam'mute dasanmaraya ibrahim, isakh‌, ya'akhub ennivareyum orkkuka
niskalankamaya oru vicaram keant nam avare ulkrstarakkiyirikkunnu. paraleaka smaranayatre at‌
tirccayayum avar nam'mute atukkal terannetukkappetta uttamanmaril pettavarakunnu
isma'il, alyasa'a‌, dulkiphl ennivareyum orkkuka. avarellavarum uttamanmaril pettavarakunnu
itearu ulbeadhanamatre. tirccayayum suksmatayullavarkk matanniccellan uttamamaya sthanamunt‌
avarkk venti kavatannal turannuveccittulla sthiravasattinre svargatteappukal
avar avite cari irunnu visramiccu keant samrd'dhamayulla phalavargannalkkum paniyattinum avasyappett keantirikkum
avarute atutt drsti niyantrikkunna samavayaskkaraya strikaluntayirikkum
itatre vicaranayute divasattekk ninnalkk vagdanam nalkappetunnat‌
tirccayayum it nam nalkunna upajivanamakunnu. at tirnnu peakunnatalla
itatre (avarute avastha). tirccayayum dhikkarikalkk matanniccellan measappetta sthanamanullat‌
narakamatre at‌. avar atil katti'eriyum. atetra measamaya visramasthanam
itanavarkkullat‌. akayal avar at asvadiccu keallatte. keatum cutulla vellavum keatum tanuppulla vellavum
(narakattil adyamettiyavareat allahu parayum:) ita, orukuttam ninnaleateappam tallikkayari varunnu. (appeal avar parayum:) avarkk svagatamilla. tirccayayum avar narakattil katti'eriyunnavaratre
avar (a katann varunnavar) parayum; alla, ninnalkk tanneyan svagatamillattat‌. ninnalan nannalkkit varuttiveccat‌. appeal vasasthalam citta tanne
avar parayum: nannalute raksitave, nannalkk it (siksa) varuttiveccatarea avann ni narakattil iratti siksa vard'dhippiccu keatukkename
